data.name: Zainul Azhar
data.title: Chief Executive Officer
data.desc: Holder of a bachelor's degree with education honors from the Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia (UKM), has served as a teacher for 25 years and has held the position of senior assistant for 5 years, experienced in MLM marketing for 19 years until now, Founders and Chief Executive Officers of PW Wellness Sdn Bhd.

data.name: Law Ah Khiau
data.title: Chief Marketing Officer
data.desc: Holder of a bachelor's degree from Universiti Sains Malaysia (USM), served as a Malay language teacher for 20 years, experienced in MLM marketing for 15 years until now, Co-Founders and Chief Marketing Officer of PW Wellness Sdn Bhd.
